title: Config loads agent-comms section
description: Verify the daemon config parser handles the agent-comms section correctly

steps.action: Add agent-comms section to cc4me.config.yaml with enabled: true, secret ref, and one peer
Start daemon and check health endpoint
Check daemon logs for agent-comms initialization
steps.expected: Log shows agent-comms config loaded with peer count

result: Steps 1-3 pass. Step 4 deferred to s-n03 init (config loads via deepMerge without explicit log until module initialization).
